page.title: 11LEGENDS by Jonathan & Simon
page.content: {Dead Field:}Mr.Terry of Tithe Hall told us about a particular field which had to be kept unploughed,otherwise a child in the family would die.He said it went back to the time when there was a high death rate amongst infants. {Tumuli:}Near this school is a Tumulus and it is said that a ghost has been seen waving a sword and blowing a long bugle.This dates back to the Civil War.A battle was fought near here {Grey Mare:}There is supposed to be a ghost at Grey Mare every 100 years.A man rides a grey mare but "mare" in Cornish means stone.There is a boundary stone on the farm. {Grandfather Clock:}When the Clock fell over three times a member of the Whell family of Kenna Coombe Farm died.The clock has now been destroyed!
